Text: Yes, most other people hate money so much. And this has to do with Baseball...how?

George2473 - 

So, in your mind, it is necessary to point out the "greed" of Jews every time you see the word? How exactly is this helpful to anyone? By the way, you might want to look up the word "fact." I don't think you know what it means.

You are so incredibly gullible when it comes to trolls. But then it does explain why you became a grade school teacher rather than try to compete with the rest of us in the real world. You may be able to bully your 10 year old students with your 11th grade education, but you'd be reduced to tears if you had to debate someone like me in public.

Subtlety is just lost on you, isn't it, Mouse? You wanna debate? Head to the PMs and go nuts. Your cyber chops have me a'trembling. Discussion of lameness will be FASCINATING from someone whose hobby is following assorted torrent loaders.
